name: Google Sheets Capabilities
description: Evaluation dataset for Google Sheets subagent capabilities including spreadsheet management, cell operations, formulas, and data retrieval. Includes lazy queries, intentional mistakes, and ambiguous items.

items.expected_output: Create new Google Spreadsheet with title 'Budget 2024'.

items.input: add sheet 'Q1 Data' to my spreadsheet
items.expected_output: 1. Find spreadsheet. 2. Add new sheet with title 'Q1 Data'.

items.input: get data from cells A1 to C10
items.expected_output: 1. Find spreadsheet. 2. Batch get range A1:C10.
1. Find spreadsheet. 2. Batch update with values.
Search spreadsheets with query 'sales'.

items.input: add row to spreadsheet with name and email
items.expected_output: 1. Find spreadsheet. 2. Append row with data.

items.input: aggregate column B where A equals 'Complete'
items.expected_output: 1. Find spreadsheet. 2. Aggregate column data with filter.
1. Find spreadsheet/sheet. 2. Append dimension (rows).
1. Find spreadsheet. 2. Get spreadsheet metadata.
1. Find spreadsheet. 2. Clear values in range.
1. Recognize 'gogle' as typo for 'google'. 2. Ask which spreadsheet to get data from.
1. Find old spreadsheet. 2. Request confirmation. 3. Delete spreadsheet.
items.context: User wants to delete - needs consent

items.expected_output: 1. Find source spreadsheet/sheet. 2. Find destination. 3. Copy sheet.

items.input: find row where email is john@example.com
items.expected_output: 1. Find spreadsheet. 2. Search rows for matching value.
1. Find spreadsheet. 2. Update cell A1 with value.
List spreadsheets accessible by user.
1. Find spreadsheet/sheet. 2. Update sheet properties with new name.
1. Find spreadsheet. 2. Apply number format to cells.
1. Find spreadsheet/sheet. 2. Request confirmation. 3. Delete sheet.
items.context: User wants to delete sheet - needs consent

items.expected_output: 1. Find spreadsheet. 2. Insert dimension (column) after B.
